name.name: fNIRS during Stroop before and after acute bout of aerobic exercise

software.description:
fNIRS data collected from prefrontal and motor cortices while human subjects perform Stroop task before and after thirty minutes of cardiovascular exercise. Associated preprint: https://www.biorxiv.org/content/early/20...

Associated Dissertation:
https://digital.library.unt.edu/ark:/675...
